attributes.action: REMOVAL OF ALL SPEED CAMERAS IN BRITAIN
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition for the removal of all speed cameras in Britain. They are not here for the safety of citizens, they are a money making scheme at the expense of others. The cause more danger than good as driver is continuously glaring at the speedometer and not at the road.

PLEASE SAVE YOU MONEY AND COST OF INSURANCE BY SIGNING THIS PETITION.

THANK YOU
